title: Bug 2345 - Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file is already open
description: Bug 2345 - When attempting to open a file with a different type of editor, it has no effect if the file is already open.
OB: When a file is already open in the editor and you select 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' from the context menu, nothing happens. The currently open editor for that file remains active.
EB: When a file is already open in the editor and you select 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' from the context menu, a new editor window should open with the file loaded using the default text editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application
2. Create a new basic project
3. Create a new file named 'test.xml'
4. The file will be opened with the scripted resource editor example, ignoring the XML file content
5. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'
6. Right-click on the file and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'
7. Verify that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains active

To fix the issue, when attempting to open a file with a different type of editor, a new editor window should be opened for the file even if it is already open.
